title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb "Bat Off Shoulder" BVG 2.5
author: Gobucsmagic74

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb "Bat Off Shoulder" BVG 2.5
posts.post_content: Beautiful, 100% crease-free card with nice corners. Under graded in my opinion and a great candidate for .5 to 1 point bump...presents like a VG+ sample. Sweet Caporal Factory 42 Overprint back. $995 delivered/insured paypal f/f, check, MO. PM if interested and/or for additional pics
